title: 30 minute chocolate cake with quick chocolate icing
ingredients: ['400g caster sugar', '250g plain flour', '1 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '225g butter', '4 tablespoons cocoa powder', '250ml water', '125ml buttermilk', '2 eggs', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '65g chopped walnuts', 'Icing', '110g butter', '4 tablespoons cocoa powder', '5 tablespoons milk', '450g sifted icing sugar', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract']
